venue.address_1: ocean rd at s. pier rd
venue.name: state pier #5

item.description:
best time of day & best time of the year to snorkel. site is recommended by an avid diver as a safe place to see cool stuff.
*** please be willing to stay w/ a buddy while in the water*** let's not lose anyone out there : )
we can bring food & eat on the beach or go out after if the group wants. i'm also planning to stick around to watch the sun set over sand hill cove or some other beach down there.
item.name: snorkeling in narragansett
